content: round 17 single_crochet into marked stitch and move the marker to this new stitch single_crochet in every stitch around do not join or turn at the end of the round 3 rounds 18- 20 repeat round 17 bind off at the end of the round - cut a tail and thread the needle sew down the center of the next stitch and pull the two stitches gently together and sew in the tail securely i like to sew in the tails as i go if you haven t sew them in now ears cut a long length of the red yarn and use it to sew the red edges together with slipstitches you will basically have a rectangle open along the purple edge divide the top of the hat into three sections and mark them with pins you can count stitches or measure it doesn t have to be exact using the same red yarn sew over to the first pin invisibly on the inside of the hat envision a diagonal line from the pin to the bottom of the orange stripe at the edge of the hat sew along the line sewing the two layers of the hat together until you reach the orange stripe sew back to the pin see black line on photo if you d like you can switch to orange yarn and sew all the way to the edge of the hat see yellow line but i don t find this necessary to get the ear effect sew across the top of the hat invisibly on the inside of the hat to the second pin pull the yarn a little to gather the hat between the pins just a bit 4 imagine another diagonal line from this pin to the bottom of the orange stripe at this edge of the hat sew along the line sewing the two layers of the hat together until you reach the orange stripe sew back to the pin sew in the tail securely if you are make a three-color hat sew all the way to the edge since you don t have to change yarn color pattern copyright judy stalus 2017 the pattern is intended for personal use only reproduction in any manner including electronic reproduction is prohibited this means that printing multiple copies electronic copying scanning posting to the internet or otherwise distributing in any form is prohibited please do not sell this pattern www beadedwire etsy com www judystalus etsy com 5
